content_descriptors.notes: Married Life With A Lamia is an 2D Erotic Monster Girl Game. The game is focusing on a lovey dovey interspecies romance between a human and a lamia. The game contains Profanity/Nudity or Sexual Content/Explicit Sexual Content/General Mature Content/Frequant Nudity or Sexual Content/Adult Only Sexual Content/BDSM/Non-consensual sex/Dubious consent/Incest/Futa/Mind Control/Vore. Most content is only unlockable from the shop; if you don't like it, don't unlock it. The game is not suitable for all ages, and all Characters in the game are Adults.

short_description: Married Life with a Lamia is a 2D Hentai game. Your wife is a Lamia. Develop your bond with her, and she will reward you sexually for fulfilling your duties.
